campaignBrief: Campaign focused on glass skin trend with hydration products. Target audience: Women aged 18-35 interested in K-beauty and skincare. Content strategy: Tutorial videos, before/after transformations, product reviews. Budget allocation: 40% micro-influencers, 30% nano-influencers, 30% TikTok ads.

targetAudience: Women 25-45, anti-aging focused, skincare routine enthusiasts
campaignBrief: Brightening campaign highlighting Vitamin C benefits. Target: Women 25-45 seeking anti-aging solutions. Content: Before/after photos, skincare routines, expert tips. Influencer mix: 50% macro (100K+), 30% micro (10K-100K), 20% nano (1K-10K).

targetAudience: All ages, outdoor enthusiasts, sun protection aware
campaignBrief: Summer sun protection campaign emphasizing SPF50 importance. Multi-platform approach: Meta Ads, Google Ads, Shopee Ads. Target: Broad audience with interest in sun protection. Creative: Educational content, UV protection facts, product demonstrations.

targetAudience: Women 30-50, anti-aging focused, premium skincare buyers
campaignBrief: Email campaign for retinol night cream targeting mature audience. Content: Skincare education, night routine guides, anti-aging benefits. Email sequence: Welcome, education, product spotlight, testimonial, limited offer.

targetAudience: Women 18-30, dry skin concerns, hydration seekers
campaignBrief: Hydration-focused campaign for Hyaluronic Acid serum. TikTok-first strategy with trending sounds and challenges. Content: Hydration tests, skin transformation videos, product reviews. Creator mix: 60% nano-influencers, 30% micro, 10% macro.

Shopee-focused campaign for K-beauty products. Strategy: Shopee Ads, flash sales, influencer collaborations. Target: Active Shopee users interested in Korean beauty. Content: Product listings optimization, video reviews, bundle promotions.

targetAudience: Teens and young adults 16-25, acne concerns, skincare beginners
campaignBrief: Acne solution campaign targeting younger audience. Content: Before/after transformations, skincare routines, dermatologist tips. Paused for creative review. Influencer focus: Authentic testimonials from real users.

targetAudience: Women 35-55, premium skincare buyers, anti-aging focused
campaignBrief: Premium email campaign for anti-aging night cream. Target: High-value customers seeking advanced skincare. Content: Expert advice, ingredient education, customer success stories. Email automation: Welcome series, educational content, product launch, special offer.

Completed glow-up transformation campaign. Focused on Vitamin C brightening serum with viral TikTok challenges. Content: 30-day transformation videos, skincare routines, product reviews. High engagement with user-generated content.

targetAudience: Women 25-45, sensitive skin concerns, gentle skincare seekers
campaignBrief: Draft campaign for sensitive skin products. Strategy: Educational content, dermatologist partnerships, gentle product focus. Target: Audience with sensitive skin looking for safe solutions. Content: Ingredient education, patch test guides, gentle routine tutorials.
